title: The Pleasure Is Ours: "Don't Quit Your Day Job"
itunes:title: The Pleasure Is Ours: "Don't Quit Your Day Job"
description:
Today, this is what's important:

The boys are hosting season 2 of The Pleasure Is Ours, a podcast all about blowing up stupid pieces of advice brought to you by the fine folks at Trojan Brand Condoms! Get ready for that bonus content coming in hawt, hawt, hawt, hawt, hawt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
